data.name: Dunkertons Park
data.full_address: Dunkertons Park, Dowdeswell Park, The Barlands, London Rd, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham GL52 6UT, United Kingdom

reviews.review_text: A lively place with a large selection of "foreign" food tastes.  A little too loud in the evening as it wants to be a night club.  Don't expect much in terms of service from the mostly young staff.  A bit expensive for the experience given.
reviews.business_response_text: Hi Bill. We are sorry to hear you did not have the experience you were expecting. Please feel free to mail our venue manager with any concerns you had whilst visiting. :-)

text.en: Hi Bill. We are sorry to hear you did not have the experience you were expecting. Please feel free to mail our venue manager with any concerns you had whilst visiting. :-)

translations.en: A lively place with a large selection of "foreign" food tastes.  A little too loud in the evening as it wants to be a night club.  Don't expect much in terms of service from the mostly young staff.  A bit expensive for the experience given.

reviews.review_text:
Been a few times now. Very good. Staff great an efficient.  Food good.
The only thing that really let's them down are the toilets and I'm sure they know it. Come on guys put some money into them and get them sorted.
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you for the review Russell. We are currently in the process of updating our facilities

text.en: Thank you for the review Russell. We are currently in the process of updating our facilities

translations.en:
Been a few times now. Very good. Staff great an efficient.  Food good.
The only thing that really let's them down are the toilets and I'm sure they know it. Come on guys put some money into them and get them sorted.

reviews.review_text: as soon as we entered this venue i was smiling - the whole atmosphere and interior give off really good vibes, which gives a lovely first impressionðŸ˜Š we ate food from the woozy pig & their fries are so yummy !!

translations.en: as soon as we entered this venue i was smiling - the whole atmosphere and interior give off really good vibes, which gives a lovely first impressionðŸ˜Š we ate food from the woozy pig & their fries are so yummy !!

reviews.review_text: Music event good.  Communications weak.  Band started 40 mins late, which we accepted as it seems typical. Trouble was after the first set - when Iâ€™d been told weâ€™d be able to eat - all the caterers closed as we tried to order food.  Probably a licensing thing. Ok but if only an MC or someone had told the audience.  Itâ€™s an eatery with entertainment so you expect to eat too.  Famished husband had to escape to eat so no second half for us. Insufficient bar staff. Badly managed from what we saw. Shame. Nice setting.
reviews.business_response_text: Hi Kay. Sorry to hear you did not have the experience expected. Please be assured we are looking at all issues raised.

text.en: Hi Kay. Sorry to hear you did not have the experience expected. Please be assured we are looking at all issues raised.

translations.en: Music event good.  Communications weak.  Band started 40 mins late, which we accepted as it seems typical. Trouble was after the first set - when Iâ€™d been told weâ€™d be able to eat - all the caterers closed as we tried to order food.  Probably a licensing thing. Ok but if only an MC or someone had told the audience.  Itâ€™s an eatery with entertainment so you expect to eat too.  Famished husband had to escape to eat so no second half for us. Insufficient bar staff. Badly managed from what we saw. Shame. Nice setting.

reviews.review_text: It's a nice place to relax with family and friends tucked out in some lovely place in Cheltenham. The car park is spacious just that it'd be a little dusty when the volume of cars parking and getting off are high.

translations.en: It's a nice place to relax with family and friends tucked out in some lovely place in Cheltenham. The car park is spacious just that it'd be a little dusty when the volume of cars parking and getting off are high.

reviews.review_text: A great idea and an excellent space to service families, however despite the vibe and food being good thereâ€™s very little currently for the kids to do (no play area as such) and the toilets are pretty grim. Iâ€™m sure given the amount of work/construction going on and the amount of money being spent, the above two negatives will be rectified.
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you for the review Ashley.

text.en: Thank you for the review Ashley.

translations.en: A great idea and an excellent space to service families, however despite the vibe and food being good thereâ€™s very little currently for the kids to do (no play area as such) and the toilets are pretty grim. Iâ€™m sure given the amount of work/construction going on and the amount of money being spent, the above two negatives will be rectified.

reviews.review_text: We loved this place so much we came back every day of our holiday. The food was incredible, so much choice and variety and the staff were so lovely too!

translations.en: We loved this place so much we came back every day of our holiday. The food was incredible, so much choice and variety and the staff were so lovely too!

reviews.review_text:
We did the cider tour as part of Cheltenham Literature Festival, all I can say is that Alistair, our guide that day, is an absolute star.
Some guided tours can be a little information heavy, he made the tour informative, but with his animated presentation it was also very listenable.
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you for taking the time to write a review, we really appreciate it. We are fond of Alistair too :-)

text.en: Thank you for taking the time to write a review, we really appreciate it. We are fond of Alistair too :-)

translations.en:
We did the cider tour as part of Cheltenham Literature Festival, all I can say is that Alistair, our guide that day, is an absolute star.
Some guided tours can be a little information heavy, he made the tour informative, but with his animated presentation it was also very listenable.

reviews.review_text:
If only there was a Dunkertons where we live.
It's the perfect place for an afternoon coffee, beer or evening out with it's food stalls. Love it.
reviews.business_response_text: Thanks Gary :-) We like it here too !

text.en: Thanks Gary :-) We like it here too !

translations.en:
If only there was a Dunkertons where we live.
It's the perfect place for an afternoon coffee, beer or evening out with it's food stalls. Love it.

reviews.review_text: One of my favourite places in the UK. The vibe is immaculate, food options are spot on and only improving each season, and the cider is just epic. 10/10. Would live there if I could.
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you for taking the time to write such a lovely review. See you on site soon!

text.en: Thank you for taking the time to write such a lovely review. See you on site soon!

translations.en: One of my favourite places in the UK. The vibe is immaculate, food options are spot on and only improving each season, and the cider is just epic. 10/10. Would live there if I could.

reviews.review_text: One of the nicest places I've eaten and drank at in ages! The best atmosphere
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review ;-)

text.en: Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review ;-)

translations.en: One of the nicest places I've eaten and drank at in ages! The best atmosphere

reviews.review_text: Not what I expected at all. Great atmosphere. Great food. Really enjoyed my first visit
reviews.business_response_text: Thanks Mark, hopefully see you again soon

text.en: Thanks Mark, hopefully see you again soon

translations.en: Not what I expected at all. Great atmosphere. Great food. Really enjoyed my first visit

reviews.review_text:
Looks like a great spot for a drink when it's busy, but on a Tuesday lunchtime it looked deserted. There were lots of wasps in the garden too. Didn't stay long as the atmosphere was dire. The street food places were limited to pizza only.

On the plus side, the cider was great and the salad bowls from the shop were exquisite and well worth Â£5.95.Shame no alcohol free cider though.

I wouldn't go back at lunchtime but I may give it another chance in the evening, although I haven't found opening times for the bar.
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you for your feedback. We will certainly take all of the raised points on board and hope to see you soon.

text.en: Thank you for your feedback. We will certainly take all of the raised points on board and hope to see you soon.

translations.en:
Looks like a great spot for a drink when it's busy, but on a Tuesday lunchtime it looked deserted. There were lots of wasps in the garden too. Didn't stay long as the atmosphere was dire. The street food places were limited to pizza only.

On the plus side, the cider was great and the salad bowls from the shop were exquisite and well worth Â£5.95.Shame no alcohol free cider though.

I wouldn't go back at lunchtime but I may give it another chance in the evening, although I haven't found opening times for the bar.

reviews.review_text:
Went for the first time on a summers weekend and definitely the last. I genuinely thought Dunkertons was just a little place that sold cider and some nice local produce, which they do. What I didnâ€™t realise is that itâ€™s also home to multiple bars and takeaway food stalls and when we turned up, it was absolutely packed. I canâ€™t remember the last time I was somewhere that busy.

The vibe wasnâ€™t really for me, either. The crowd was exactly the sort you would expect, loud, flash, and clearly spending beyond their means, nice new cars on finance and outfits courtesy of ASOS bought on Klarna, all very â€˜look at meâ€™. It felt more like a festival of egos than anything else. A very hyper-extroverted crowd of people for sure. Bit sad, really, because the cider itself is genuinely lovely. I picked up a bottle of the Perry and it was fantastic, really high quality, organic too, which I love.

Beyond the cider, the shop is sweet, nice produce, bit on the pricey side but goes with the territory.

Iâ€™d absolutely buy the cider again, no question. Just not from there. Online only for me from now on, wonâ€™t be stepping foot back at the venue again.

The cider is 5 stars, my rating is based on the venue.

translations.en:

The cider is 5 stars, my rating is based on the venue.

reviews.review_text: Great atmosphere and fantastic variety of food.
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you for taking the time to review :-)

text.en: Thank you for taking the time to review :-)

translations.en: Great atmosphere and fantastic variety of food.

reviews.review_text: I have been meaning to Visit Dunkertons Cider for ages as I'm a bit fan of the Cider Barn in Hereford. This place didn't disappoint. From the big plants, fairy lights, music & friendly people to the quick food and delicious Cider. What's more super dog friendly with cooler spots and bowls of water. There were lots of families and we'll as friends just hanging out enjoying it. 100% recommend.
reviews.business_response_text: Hey Gemma, really glad to know we lived up to your expectations!

text.en: Hey Gemma, really glad to know we lived up to your expectations!

translations.en: I have been meaning to Visit Dunkertons Cider for ages as I'm a bit fan of the Cider Barn in Hereford. This place didn't disappoint. From the big plants, fairy lights, music & friendly people to the quick food and delicious Cider. What's more super dog friendly with cooler spots and bowls of water. There were lots of families and we'll as friends just hanging out enjoying it. 100% recommend.

reviews.review_text: Dunkertons was absolutely amazing! The experience was fantastic, and a huge shoutout to Nick for making it so special. His knowledge, enthusiasm, and excellent service really stood out. Highly recommend, will definitely be back!

translations.en: Dunkertons was absolutely amazing! The experience was fantastic, and a huge shoutout to Nick for making it so special. His knowledge, enthusiasm, and excellent service really stood out. Highly recommend, will definitely be back!

reviews.review_text: I love this place. Such a great and wonderful place, with such a unique vibe. Loved the cider and all the staff were super helpful. Definitely recommend if youâ€™re in the Cotswold area. Love love love ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ˜.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely lovely place to go with family and friends. Easy access.  A few different eating choices inside. Loads of different drinks to choose from. Good outside sitting for when the weather is sunny.
reviews.business_response_text: Thank You. See you again soon!

text.en: Thank You. See you again soon!

translations.en: Absolutely lovely place to go with family and friends. Easy access.  A few different eating choices inside. Loads of different drinks to choose from. Good outside sitting for when the weather is sunny.

reviews.review_text: Excellent venue! Great staff! So friendly. Spoilt for choice with the food vendors!! Brilliant live music! Well done Nick Smith and the wonderful staff!!

translations.en: Excellent venue! Great staff! So friendly. Spoilt for choice with the food vendors!! Brilliant live music! Well done Nick Smith and the wonderful staff!!
